mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product VALUES(NULL, #{user_seq}, #{img}, #{maker}, #{goal_price}, #{title}, SYSDATE(), NULL, #{close_date}, #{content}, NULL, NULL, #{cate_seq}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT seq, cate_seq, title, maker, created_date, open_date, product_check FROM product ORDER BY seq DESC
SELECT seq, img, title, maker, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, SYSDATE(), close_date+1) AS remainingDays, total_supporters FROM product WHERE product_check="Y" ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 8

SELECT product.seq AS SEQ, product.img AS IMG, product.maker AS MAKER, product.goal_price AS GOAL_PRICE, product.title AS TITLE, product.created_date AS CREATED_DATE, product.close_date AS CLOSE_DATE, product.content AS CONTENT, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, SYSDATE(), product.close_date + 1) AS remainingDays, product.total_supporters AS TOTAL_SUPPORTERS FROM product WHERE product.cate_seq = #{cate_seq} ORDER BY remainingDays DESC
